languages.text: "Иногда я позволяю ему поиграть с трупами еретиков". {n}Соломон выдерживает паузу.{/n} "Шутка. Если вы спрашиваете про развлечения, то само это слово плохо применимо к служебной собаке Арбитес. Однако мне кажется, что Глейто с энтузиазмом воспринимает мои персональные тренировки. Ему нравится сопровождать меня в беге на долгие дистанции, и во время стрелковой практики он всегда ждет, что я дам ему приказ атаковать мишень".

"Sometimes, I let him play with heretics' corpses." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That was a joke. If you're asking about entertainment, that concept does not really apply to an Arbites dog. But I like to imagine that Glaito is enthusiastic about training with me, that he enjoys running long distances at my side. And, during target practice, he always seems eager to hear me give the attack order."
languages.original_text: "Иногда я позволяю ему поиграть с трупами еретиков". {n}Соломон выдерживает паузу.{/n} "Шутка. Если вы спрашиваете про развлечения, то само это слово плохо применимо к служебной собаке Арбитес. Однако мне кажется, что Глейто с энтузиазмом воспринимает мои персональные тренировки. Ему нравится сопровождать меня в беге на долгие дистанции, и во время стрелковой практики он всегда ждет, что я дам ему приказ атаковать мишень".

That he enjoys running long distances at my side, and, during target practice, he always seems eager to hear me give the attack order."

languages.text: 「時々、異端者の死体で遊ばせてやります」{n}ソロモーンは一拍置いた。{/n}「…冗談ですよ。娯楽のことを聞いているなら、高等裁定局の犬にそういう概念はほとんど当てはまりません。ですが、グライトは訓練を楽しんでいると思いたいですね。私の隣を並走する長距離走も、気に入っているはずです。それに射撃訓練のときは、私が攻撃命令を出すのを、いつも心待ちにしているように見えます」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I let him play with heretics' corpses." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That was a joke. If you're asking about entertainment, that concept does not really apply to an Arbites dog. But I like to imagine that Glaito is enthusiastic about training with me, that he enjoys running long distances at my side. And, during target practice, he always seems eager to hear me give the attack order."

traits.locale_text: 「時々、異端者の死体で遊ばせてやります」{n}ソロモーンは一拍置いた。{/n}「…冗談ですよ。娯楽のことを聞いているなら、高等裁定局の犬にそういう概念はほとんど当てはまりません。ですが、グライトは訓練を楽しんでいると思いたいですね。私の隣を並走する長距離走も、気に入っているはずです。それに射撃訓練のときは、私が攻撃命令を出すのを、いつも心待ちにしているように見えます」

languages.text: "Ich lasse ihn manchmal mit Leichen von Ketzern spielen." {n}Solomorne hält inne.{/n} "Das war ein Scherz. Wenn Ihr nach Unterhaltung fragt, so ist das ein Konzept, das für einen Arbites-Hund nicht gilt. Aber ich stelle mir vor, dass Glaito Spaß an seinem Training mit mir hat, dass er gerne lange Strecken an meiner Seite läuft. Und beim Zieltraining scheint er immer eifrig auf einen Angriffsbefehl von mir zu warten."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I let him play with heretics' corpses." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That was a joke. If you're asking about entertainment, that concept does not really apply to an Arbites dog. But I like to imagine that Glaito is enthusiastic about training with me, that he enjoys running long distances at my side. And, during target practice, he always seems eager to hear me give the attack order."

traits.locale_text: "Ich lasse ihn manchmal mit Leichen von Ketzern spielen." {n}Solomorne hält inne.{/n} "Das war ein Scherz. Wenn Ihr nach Unterhaltung fragt, so ist das ein Konzept, das für einen Arbites-Hund nicht gilt. Aber ich stelle mir vor, dass Glaito Spaß an seinem Training mit mir hat, dass er gerne lange Strecken an meiner Seite läuft. Und beim Zieltraining scheint er immer eifrig auf einen Angriffsbefehl von mir zu warten."

languages.text: « Parfois, je le laisse s'amuser avec des cadavres d'hérétiques. {n}déclare Solomorne avant de s'interrompre un instant.{/n} Je plaisantais. Concernant les loisirs, sachez que ce concept est étranger pour les chiens de l'Arbites. Mais j'ai envie de penser que Glaito apprécie ses séances de dressage avec moi et aime courir sur de longues distances à mes côtés. De plus, lors de nos entraînements sur cible, il semble toujours impatient de m'entendre lui donner l'ordre d'attaquer. »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I let him play with heretics' corpses." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That was a joke. If you're asking about entertainment, that concept does not really apply to an Arbites dog. But I like to imagine that Glaito is enthusiastic about training with me, that he enjoys running long distances at my side. And, during target practice, he always seems eager to hear me give the attack order."

traits.locale_text: « Parfois, je le laisse s'amuser avec des cadavres d'hérétiques. {n}déclare Solomorne avant de s'interrompre un instant.{/n} Je plaisantais. Concernant les loisirs, sachez que ce concept est étranger pour les chiens de l'Arbites. Mais j'ai envie de penser que Glaito apprécie ses séances de dressage avec moi et aime courir sur de longues distances à mes côtés. De plus, lors de nos entraînements sur cible, il semble toujours impatient de m'entendre lui donner l'ordre d'attaquer. »

languages.text: «A veces le dejo jugar con los cadáveres de los herejes». {n}Solomorne hace una pausa.{/n} «Eso ha sido una broma. Si se refiere a cómo suele divertirse, no es un concepto que pueda aplicarse a un perro del Arbites. Pero a mí me gusta imaginar que Glaito disfruta entrenándose conmigo y corriendo largas distancias a mi lado. Y cuando hacemos prácticas de combate, siempre parece muy entusiasmado por oírme dar la orden de ataque».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I let him play with heretics' corpses." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That was a joke. If you're asking about entertainment, that concept does not really apply to an Arbites dog. But I like to imagine that Glaito is enthusiastic about training with me, that he enjoys running long distances at my side. And, during target practice, he always seems eager to hear me give the attack order."

traits.locale_text: «A veces le dejo jugar con los cadáveres de los herejes». {n}Solomorne hace una pausa.{/n} «Eso ha sido una broma. Si se refiere a cómo suele divertirse, no es un concepto que pueda aplicarse a un perro del Arbites. Pero a mí me gusta imaginar que Glaito disfruta entrenándose conmigo y corriendo largas distancias a mi lado. Y cuando hacemos prácticas de combate, siempre parece muy entusiasmado por oírme dar la orden de ataque».

languages.text: “有的时候，我会让它把异端分子的尸体当玩具玩。”{n}索罗蒙顿了顿。{/n}“刚刚是在开玩笑。如果你指的是娱乐的话，那这个概念恐怕并不适用于法务部的狗。不过，格雷托好像很喜欢和我一起训练，它总是很喜欢和我一起长跑。而且在打靶练习的过程中，它好像总是迫切想让我下达进攻指令。”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I let him play with heretics' corpses." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That was a joke. If you're asking about entertainment, that concept does not really apply to an Arbites dog. But I like to imagine that Glaito is enthusiastic about training with me, that he enjoys running long distances at my side. And, during target practice, he always seems eager to hear me give the attack order."

traits.locale_text: “有的时候，我会让它把异端分子的尸体当玩具玩。”{n}索罗蒙顿了顿。{/n}“刚刚是在开玩笑。如果你指的是娱乐的话，那这个概念恐怕并不适用于法务部的狗。不过，格雷托好像很喜欢和我一起训练，它总是很喜欢和我一起长跑。而且在打靶练习的过程中，它好像总是迫切想让我下达进攻指令。”

languages.text: "Bazen kâfirlerin cesetleriyle oynamasına izin veririm." {n}Solomorne duraklıyor.{/n} "Şaka yapıyorum. Arbites köpekleri eğlence kavramını bilmez. Fakat Glaito'nun benimle idman yaparken heyecanlandığını, yanımda uzun mesafeler koşmaktan keyif aldığını düşünmek hoşuma gidiyor. Ayrıca hedef talimi sırasında saldır emrini vermemi hep hevesle bekliyor gibi görünür."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I let him play with heretics' corpses." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That was a joke. If you're asking about entertainment, that concept does not really apply to an Arbites dog. But I like to imagine that Glaito is enthusiastic about training with me, that he enjoys running long distances at my side. And, during target practice, he always seems eager to hear me give the attack order."

traits.locale_text: "Bazen kâfirlerin cesetleriyle oynamasına izin veririm." {n}Solomorne duraklıyor.{/n} "Şakaydı. Arbites köpekleri eğlence kavramını bilmez. Ama Glaito'nun benimle idman yaparken heyecanlandığını, yanımda uzun mesafeler koşmaktan keyif aldığını düşünmek hoşuma gidiyor. Ayrıca, hedef talimi sırasında saldır emrini vermemi hep hevesle bekliyor gibi görünür."

If you're asking about entertainment, that concept does not really apply to an Arbites dog. But I like to imagine that Glaito is enthusiastic about training with me, that he enjoys running long distances at my side. And, during target practice, he always seems eager to hear me give the attack order."
